subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: On Saturday, all eyes will be on the clock as Floyd Landis and the other contenders in the Tour de France battle it out in a 35.4-mile sprint.
snippet: On Saturday, all eyes will be on the clock as Floyd Landis and the other contenders in the Tour de France battle it out in a 35.4-mile sprint.
